org.openstreetmap.osm.io
Class HsqldbDatabaseLoader

java.lang.Object
  org.openstreetmap.osm.io.HsqldbDatabaseLoader
All Implemented Interfaces:
IDatabaseLoader
public class HsqldbDatabaseLoader
extends java.lang.Object
implements IDatabaseLoader

Helper-class to load OpenStreetMap-data from a database.

Author:
Marcus Wolschon
